column5: yes sir i like it sounds clean. It better sound clean coming from a V8
I feel like I just heard fourteen liters of gas get burned up....  sounds cool though!
sorry but makes no sense to me...
SEE, the internet is not always a good thing.........

Isn't there anything about the rumble of exhaust that tweaks something way down deep? I still roll down the car windows to listen when I see a bike or car that might have that sound.  My wife disapproves too. Guess that's why none of our vehicles have it any more.  JF
sounds good randy.  makes me want to put an exhaust on the jeep and a turbo + vented blow off valve & downpipe.  ahhhh... someone slap me

My Expedition did 9.5 MPG city and 12.0 HWY  .... I've since added a EDGE Performance Tuner and a TBS..and a K&N Cold Air Intake along with a Tornado Insert  ....I've upped my horsepower 25% and I now do 12.9 city and about 18.6 hwy.. Total cost of 800.00$ ...I do all my own installs Less restrictive exhaust and more air flow = more power & Better fuel economy .. It's almost paid for itself in fuel economy...  And I like the sound..  I work in parts as a living  ... to sell myself the O.E replacement I'd of paid 110.00$ for my muffler.. In this case I paid  86.00$  Stainless Steel Lifetime Warranty.  My Truck sees alot of HWY and Offroad... I figure I've got the best of both worlds.
Randy, chuck that tornado insert away.  If it's the one I am thinking of it does nothing but restrict the intake.
All yer missing is a dual pipe outfit. Sweet sound Randy.
yep got love for the magnaflow,nice set up
It's on a Ford "Feeble Offering Roaring Dimly"  and a Tornado, hahahahah  Get a little closer to the snowbank, maybe you can blow some away.
